attributes.action: STOP STUPID TAXES ON DIESEL CARS/VANS IN CITIES "TOXIN TAX"
attributes.additional_details: This article was in the sun. Google it for more information
attributes.background: Government trying to introduce a toxin tax in cities for diesel cars vans and wagons. Tgis ks similar to the congestion charge in london but affecting leeds and other cities lets get this stopped asap. The government need to stop pinpointing drivers.   HUMAN RIGHTS DOESNT EXIST IN THIS COUNTRY NOW!!
